isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - SKIRT PANELS, AERO SIDE SKIRT PANELS, BODY AIR DEFLECTORS, BUMPERS AND ROOFS - 0. ROOF AIR DEFLECTOR - INSTALL ROOF AIR DEFLECTORS - 9100i, 9200i, 9400i, AND 9900i MODELS

svcproc.title: INSTALL ROOF AIR DEFLECTORS - 9100 i, 9200 i, 9400 i, AND 9900 i MODELS

note.para: Tighten all nuts until snug. After the air deflector is completely installed, tighten all nuts/bolts to 31 ft-lbs. (42 N•m).

step1.para: Attach rear supports and front mounting supports to cab roof.
Attach front mounting brackets to front mounting supports.
Attach stabilizer angle and bracket assembly to rear supports and front mounting brackets.
Attach support tube to stabilizer angle brackets. Rear mounting support has to be attached to support tube prior to installation.
Position air deflector and attach to front mounting brackets, stabilizer angles, and rear mounting supports.
